name: Theologia Magistus
text: Target 1 "Magistus" monster you control; equip 1 "Magistus" monster from your Extra Deck, field, or GY to it, except a Level 4 monster, or, if you have at least 1 each of "Magistus" Fusion, Synchro, Xyz, and Link Monsters in your GY, you can equip 1 non-"Magistus" Fusion, Synchro, Xyz, or Link Monster from your Extra Deck, instead. You can only activate 1 "Theologia Magistus" once per turn.
